text: Dr Ong is an excellent paediatric surgeon with impeccable bedside manners! We saw her in her newly renovated clinic and her staff were so helpful. Her years of clinical experience shows in the way she interacted with my girl. Thank you Dr Ong and Vivienne!
Took care of my daughter while she was in KK. Compassionate and responsive. Thank you Dr Ong. You are a blessing!
Dr. Ong is a great surgeon who and she is really caring with kids as well
